full_summary:
=====================

### Advance Contract Award Notice

**Tender Reference:** WS3814273832
**Title:** ACAN - Lucira Multiplex Tests

**Publication Date:** January 13, 2023
**Closing Date:** January 28, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (ET)
**Contract Start Date:** January 31, 2023

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Health (HC) is issuing an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the procurement of Lucira Multiplex Tests. This tender is closed and the contract is awarded to the only bidder that meets the requirements.

**Scope of Work:**
The procurement is for the supply of Lucira Multiplex Tests, a medical diagnostic imaging product.

**Regions of Delivery:** 
* Canada
* Ontario (except NCR)

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Contact Information:**
Kevin Godard
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Phone: Not Applicable
Email: [kevin.godard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kevin.godard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Documents and Attachments
None available.

### Language of Document
English and French.

Note to contractors: If any contractors are interested in this project, it is not possible to submit a bid since this is an advance contract award notice. However if you require any further information about this project you can refer to the contact information above.  The contact person will do his best to assist you. Do not forget to reference the tender reference (WS3814273832) when you contact the responsible person for this tender.
